html:
4.18.18  11:33 pm   who are you rooting for?

     you

4.18.18  11:28 pm   Do you listen music by other people while working?

     no, most of my work has music in it, so that would be catastrophically distracting

4.18.18  10:35 pm   bill how do i write

     try a way that no one has ever tried before

4.18.18  10:32 pm   will you ever do those videos like "2 million sub special".

     no

4.18.18  9:44 pm   Are the depths a suitable place for a get together?

     sure, and heights

4.18.18  9:38 pm   Have any businesses trying to have you do promotions done so via this question page,

     yes

      or did they only ever use "formal" means of communication?

4.18.18  9:32 pm   what are your thoughts on keyboard shortcuts 

     i love them. i want to know them all and then i want more

4.18.18  8:39 pm   for a song longer than 3 or 4 minutes to work well you say that it needs to have some storytelling elements to pull it along,

     could be helpful. also video

      but songs shorter than that still need story telling elements a lot of the time, right?

     it can be helpful

4.18.18  8:32 pm   is the new video cool

     yes

4.18.18  8:09 pm   Are you glad we got agriculture?

     yes

4.18.18  7:50 pm   Who invented the thing inventor?

     the homo sapien, specifically the homo sapien sapien

4.18.18  7:45 pm   why dont u put ads 

     perhaps they suck

4.18.18  7:20 pm   is anyone else excited that you have obviously been steadily working on another sonic treat with integrated visual stimuli?

     i think so

4.18.18  6:50 pm   how often should a sentence contain the letter z

     just enough to get the job done

4.18.18  6:37 pm   HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

     thank you

4.18.18  5:59 pm   For a m6 chord, is the 6 a minor 6 or a major 6?

     maj

      I think it's the maj6, but isn't the 6th note in the minor scale flat?

     sure but Cmin6 means it has A (and Eb) that's just what it means

      If m6 does mean a chord with a minor 3rd with a major 6th, what would you a call a chord where the 3rd was minor AND the 6th was minor? mb6?

     Ab/C, or "Ab over C", or Abmaj7/C, or "Abmaj7 over C"

4.18.18  5:46 pm   Test? There is a test to be gay?

     absolutely not

      I didn't know there would be a test for a sexuality.  

     there is not

     Help I'm freaking out?

4.18.18  5:32 pm   You ever listen to Lyle Lovett?

     my parents did when i was younger

4.18.18  5:15 pm   how long does the script-writing process for a 1-minute video usually take

     it depends on the contents

4.18.18  5:13 pm   what's a healthy colour for an onion

     purple

4.18.18  5:12 pm   does your next video involve fences in any way

     i don't think so

4.18.18  5:11 pm   Do you not like capital letters

     no, i don't not

      or are you just too lazy to use them?

     i use them when i think it is useful

4.18.18  5:05 pm   Are you an elf?

     legally yes, for tax purposes

4.18.18  4:59 pm   Why did you not make All U Need Is Love a music video :(

     because i wanted to make more songs instead :(

4.18.18  4:50 pm   Please disclose your preferred theory of reality A.Solipsism B. Virtual C. Real things & stuff

     C

4.18.18  4:41 pm   https://instagram.com/p/BhYBZ02Hsvc/
1. Wouldn't it be cool to change 240 on the other left to 420

     no, it already said 420 before i got here. i switched it to 240

     2. Does the yellow poster on the left say "SEX POSITIONS"

     no

4.18.18  4:29 pm   Please stop with the music the o ry already!!!!! My gosh

     you can try to make a music theory, but the music is only going to find a new way to evade the theory. it is the darndest thing

4.18.18  4:29 pm   Fuck you bill. You changed how people spell "laser". IT'S SPELLED "LASER" NOT "LAZER" YOU %½#^% FUCKING IDIOT 

     many people have spelled it 'lazer' before. for example, a music group called Major Lazer has spelled it lazer, i believe

4.18.18  4:13 pm   I have a bad habit of (unintentionally) gradually speeding up the tempo of songs when playing. I can catch myself if I go back and listen to it, but when I'm just playing it's hard for me to notice when I'm doing it. Any tips? I can play along with a metronome just fine, but without the metronome/drum track I just fall back into the habit of gradually speeding up. 

     you could try listening to a metronome more often, just around the house or whatever

4.18.18  4:10 pm   ok, so i did some thinking...
are you afraid that the whole vidcon thing would actually somehow backfire on you?

     yes but not anymore

     
because one of the things that i find so interesting about you is that there are hardly any videos (actually just a single one i believe) of you making a public appearance.
it is very similar to serban ghenea!
he is probably one of the most successful mixing engineers yet we know so little about him (actually we know nothing...)
i guess what i am going at is:
are you afraid of then no longer being able to control what footage of you ends up online?

     that is scary for anyone, but it is important to reconcile that fear. even better is to never let anyone see you unless you get to be the producer

4.18.18  4:01 pm   4.17.18  10:07 pm well yeah, but what does it MEEEEEEEEANNNNNNNNN?

     as i'm working on video projects, sometimes i find things that look intriguing or interesting, and when that happens i take a screenshot and squarify the aspect ratio and put it on instagram. this is a way of showing unannounced sneak previews of the next release. almost everything i have ever posted on instagram is an artifact from a project that was upcoming at the time. it is nice to post things once a day, but sometimes i just don't come across anything i want to post, especially if i am working on the audio

4.18.18  3:13 pm   Why do you post so rarely

     because i spend the rest of the time making the content i post

4.18.18  3:06 pm   Do you think your video quality is going up or down over time?

     up

4.18.18  2:57 pm   How to unlearn learned helplessness? 

     how did you learn the helplessness

4.18.18  2:05 pm   What do you like most about music?

     nobody quite knows what it is, and yet it still seems to know exactly who we are

4.18.18  2:05 pm   What do you dislike most about disliking things?

     the dislike i receive from others about disliking the thing, as well as simply missing out on all the joys and pleasures of the thing

4.18.18  1:48 pm   will this video take as long as la de da de da de da de day oh?

     it is a bit shorter, so it should take a slightly shorter amount of time, plus i tried to make it worse in order to get it done faster but the bad news is i am unfortunately doing it better which makes it take longer despite my best efforts to do it quicker and worse

4.18.18  1:37 pm   how is true love different from just love

     it is more expensive

4.18.18  1:26 pm   Can you please give me cancer?

     that doesn't sound like a good use of my time

4.18.18  1:20 pm   I can only feel the thoughts in my brain (and only parts of may brain at that), but I can't feel the thoughts outside my brain, even if they're directly adjacent. Why is consciousness localized like this?

     perhaps it's not connected properly

4.18.18  1:03 pm   Are you a climate change denier?

     i say, let the climate change, if it wants

4.18.18  12:31 pm   4.17.18  1:43 pm is there a standard clef for a drum kit?

     i've seen the rhythm clef, or no clef, either way it's pretty obvious when you look at it that it's a drum set

      like, does the bottom line always mean bass drum, etc? 

     usually either the bottom line or the bottom space, but the parts are often labeled

4.18.18  11:45 am   do the lyrics of the new song reflect on the point that a 19th century gentleman could listen and enjoy the song, mr wurtz?

     maybe

4.18.18  10:34 am   How many times the word 'the' used in your new video? 

     i think 19

4.18.18  10:08 am   when you first start creating something, what kind of audience would you put in mind?

     the king and queen

     i bet they'll act as a really strong incentive if they truly exist.

4.18.18  10:06 am   i find if i quit talking or writing for a couple of days, then myself will be cast into a speechless state. i got less and less to write out, and i sometimes think everything i write is of no value. they are just nonsense and jibberish and could thus be justly considered a waste of time. then i discover other people's writings, which i would think mostly waffle, sometimes interesting, but still a few of them make great sense. at last i discover in horror i even lose the ability to write nonsense. how to deal with this. should i just continue creating garbage and persuade myself it is okay,

     yes

     which i know clearly is not, while there seems like no improvement and also no way out? ah geez. but i would be scared even more when everything turns bleak and bland, and ''i've got nothing to say, so let it be'' stuff.

     it is very important to start the flow, and the magic will start to occur right around the corner

4.18.18  9:52 am   is it possible to teach myself at home for the college entrance examination,

     i think so, especially nowadays

      since i don't think the school is of much help to my current situation? just a little bit uncertain

4.18.18  9:49 am   do you agree that a=432?

     in most of the music i have heard it is 440, especially in the last 15 years, and even before that it was almost always 440 but sometimes the final recording was shifted on tape

4.18.18  9:43 am   Man, wouldn't making lyrics be so interesting in a different language where words like osteoperosis have only 1 syllable, but words like house have 3 or four? It would really shift things up.

     most languages have multiple options for saying most things, with a variety of syllabic structures. but writing for different languages would be very interesting

4.18.18  9:20 am   when you listen a new song what thing in that song usually makes you go whoa and you have to listen to that part again?

     i find it's usually disruptive to stop and repeat part of a song before you have heard it all the way through at least once. it interrupts the song from itself. studying parts of a song is great but not on the first listen. it's very important to me to let it roll on the first listen
